item.title: Redmi 14C budget 5G smartphone goes on sale: Check price, specs and more - Business Standard
item.description:
Redmi 14C Budget 5G Smartphone Launched: Pricing and Features

Date: January 10, 2025, Source: Business Standard

Xiaomi’s Redmi 14C 5G smartphone is officially available in India starting at Rs 9,999. It features the Qualcomm Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor and supports dual 5G SIMs.

  • Price: Rs 9,999 for 4GB RAM + 64GB storage
  • Variants: 4GB RAM + 128GB for Rs 10,999, 6GB RAM + 128GB for Rs 11,999
  • Colors: Stardust Purple, Stargaze Black, Starlight Blue
  • Display: 6.88-inch HD+, 120Hz refresh rate
  • Camera: 50MP rear, 8MP front
  • Battery: 5160mAh with 18W charging
“The display is TUV Rheinland-certified for reduced blue light and flicker-free visuals, ensuring eye comfort.”

The Redmi 14C 5G is positioned as an affordable smartphone with attractive specifications, making it appealing for budget-conscious consumers.

item.title: iPhone 16 to get Rs 15,901 discount during Flipkart Republic Day sale - India Today
item.description:
iPhone 16 to get Rs 15,901 discount during Flipkart Republic Day sale

Publication Date: January 2024 Source: India Today

Flipkart has announced a significant discount for the iPhone 16 during the upcoming Republic Day sale, starting January 13, bringing its price down to Rs 63,999.

  • The iPhone 16 was originally launched in India at Rs 79,900.
  • The effective discount during the sale will be Rs 15,901.
  • The final deal may include both flat discounts and bank offers.
  • There could be an exchange bonus discount as part of the offer.
  • Features of the iPhone 16 include the latest A18 chip, a Super Retina XDR OLED display, and a 48MP main camera.
“The iPhone 16 is IP68-rated, offering splash, water, and dust resistance for added durability.”

This exciting discount on the iPhone 16 is expected to attract many customers during the Republic Day sale on Flipkart.

item.title: [CES 2025] Home of the Future: Samsung Redefines the Standard for Smart Home - samsung.com
item.description:
Home of the Future: Samsung Redefines the Standard for Smart Home

Publication Date: January 2025
Source: Samsung Newsroom

At CES 2025 in Las Vegas, Samsung Electronics unveiled its vision for the future of smart homes, focusing on AI-driven solutions designed to improve efficiency, wellness, productivity, and art integration within the home.

  • Samsung's booth featured immersive experiences categorized into Home for Efficiency, Home for Wellness, Home for Loved Ones, Home for Productivity, and Home for Art.
  • The Home for Efficiency showcased AI technology to streamline household tasks and energy management.
  • Innovative appliances like the Bespoke AI Laundry Combo™ and Bespoke AI Jet Bot Combo™ were highlighted for their efficiency.
  • The Home for Loved Ones zone introduced AI solutions for caring for family members and pets, including monitoring falls and activity.
  • Productivity tools powered by Galaxy AI were showcased, including features of the soon-to-be-launched Galaxy Book5 Pro.
  • The Home for Art zone featured collaborations with leading art institutions presenting famous artworks through Samsung screens.
“This space is just breathtaking because it’s so immersive,” said Scott Mulkey, an attendee from Dallas, Texas.

Overall, Samsung's exhibit at CES 2025 reflects its commitment to advancing intelligent home solutions to enhance daily living and provide more time for what matters.

item.title: Google tests AI-generated daily podcast with personalised content: Report - Business Standard
item.description:
Google tests AI-generated daily podcast with personalised content: Report

Publication Date: Jan 10 2025 | Source: 9To5Google

Google is reportedly testing a new AI-powered feature called Daily Listen that generates personalised daily podcasts based on users' online interactions. The feature curates five-minute audio tracks using a person's Google Search data and Discover feed interactions.

  • The Daily Listen feature is rolling out on Google's Search Labs platform in the US for both Android and iOS.
  • It frames an audio track that includes topics and stories of interest to the user.
  • A carousel card in the Google app indicates the feature with a 'made for you' badge.
  • The audio player includes playback control options and provides text transcripts.
  • Users can give feedback by rating the generated track.
"The personalised AI-powered audio experiment offers an overview of all the curated topics and allows user interaction for feedback."

This new feature signifies Google's continued innovation in AI and user engagement, enhancing personalized experiences within its app ecosystem.

item.title: Redmi Note 14 Pro Launched: Full Specifications, Price, Features, And More - HerZindagi English
item.description:
Redmi Note 14 Pro Launched: Full Specifications, Price, Features, And More

Publication Date: Not Specified | Source: Herzindagi

The Redmi Note 14 Pro features a 50MP camera, a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Ultra processor, and a 5500mAh battery. It is part of Xiaomi's effort to enhance its mid-range smartphone offerings.

  • The smartphone offers two storage configurations: 8GB RAM with 256GB storage and 8GB RAM with 128GB storage, both priced at ₹24,999.
  • Notable discounts available on Flipkart, including an 11% discount on the Pro+ 5G variant.
  • It features a 6.67-inch 1.5K curved OLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Ultra chipset with a Mali-G615 MC2 GPU.
  • Houses a robust 5500mAh battery with 45W fast charging technology.
  • The camera setup includes a 50MP primary sensor, an 8MP ultra-wide lens, and a 2MP macro lens, plus a 20MP front camera for selfies.
  • Offers additional incentives like 5% unlimited cashback for customers using Flipkart Axis Bank credit cards.
"Introducing the #RedmiNote14 Pro+ 5G, packed with everything you need for an unforgettable experience!" — Xiaomi India

This launch represents Xiaomi's continued commitment to providing value in the mid-range smartphone market.

item.title: Gujarat Fluorochemicals announces incorporation of step-down subsidiary in Singapore - Business Standard
item.description:
Gujarat Fluorochemicals Forms New Subsidiary in Singapore

Date: Jan 10 2025 | Source: Capital Market - Live News

Gujarat Fluorochemicals has announced the incorporation of a new wholly owned subsidiary in Singapore, GFCL EV Products Pte., which was officially registered on January 7, 2025.

  • The subsidiary was incorporated as part of GFCL's strategic expansion efforts.
  • The Accounting and Corporate Regulatory Authority of Singapore issued a Certificate confirming the incorporation on January 9, 2025.

No Business Standard Journalist was involved in the creation of this content.

This development marks a significant step for Gujarat Fluorochemicals in expanding its international presence.

item.title: [CES 2025] Samsung Unveils a New Vision for Displays at First Look Event - Samsung Newsroom Malaysia
item.description:
Samsung Unveils a New Vision for Displays at First Look Event

Date: January 2025 Source: Samsung News

Samsung Electronics highlighted its technological leadership through a showcase of innovative products ahead of CES 2025, introducing Vision AI to enhance user experiences with personalized AI features.

  • Introduction of Vision AI for personalized screens.
  • Showcase of Generative Wallpaper technology that customizes digital displays.
  • Display innovations including HoloDisplay and MICRO LED Beauty Mirror.
  • Next-generation screens focus on lifestyle integration and aesthetic appeal.
  • Interactive experiences with innovative features like Live Translate and Click to Search.
“Samsung continues to pave the way for smarter, more convenient lifestyles.”

The event showcased Samsung’s direction towards integrating AI in display technologies, signifying a major step towards personalized user experiences in homes.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25, S25+, S25 Ultra price leaked, phones could cost more this time - India Today
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25, S25+, S25 Ultra price leaked, phones could cost more this time

Published on: Jan 10, 2025 by: Nandini Yadav

Samsung is scheduled to host the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22, showcasing the new Galaxy S25 series, with leaked pricing information surfacing ahead of the official announcement.

Key Points:

  • The Galaxy S25 series will include the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra, with rumors of an S25 Slim variant.
  • Pricing for the Galaxy S25 starts at 964 euros (~Rs 85,000) for the 128GB model, with higher capacities costing more.
  • The Galaxy S25+ is expected to start at 1,235 euros (~Rs 1,09,000), while the S25 Ultra could start at 1,557 euros (~Rs 1,38,000).
  • Colour options include icy blue, mint, navy, silver, and more premium shades for the Ultra variant.
  • Pre-reservations in India have begun, allowing customers to customize their orders and receive exclusive offers.

Notable Quotes:

“Pre-reservations in India have started for Rs 1,999, offering early access and benefits worth Rs 5,000.”

As the release date approaches, consumers are eager to see how the new models will compete in the high-end smartphone market.

item.title: Uncertainty looms over launch of Irdai's ambitious Bima Sugam project - Business Standard
item.description:
Uncertainty Looms Over Launch of Irdai's Ambitious Bima Sugam Project

Date: January 10, 2025 | Source: Business Standard

The Bima Sugam project aims to create a user-friendly digital platform for insurance transactions, likened to a 'UPI moment' for the industry, yet its launch date remains uncertain.

  • Industry players doubt the project will meet its launch target of April 2025.
  • There has been minimal progress and updates regarding the project.
  • The initiative is supported by significant regulatory bodies, including the Life Insurance Council and the General Insurance Council.
“Bima Sugam is hailed as a 'UPI moment' for the industry,” - Debasish Panda, Irdai Chairman.

The future of the Bima Sugam project remains unclear, highlighting the challenges of implementing such an ambitious initiative in the insurance sector.

item.title: Oppo Reno 13 and Oppo Reno 13 Pro launched: Price in India, specs, and all you need to know - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Oppo Reno 13 and Oppo Reno 13 Pro launched: Price in India, specs, and all you need to know

Date: January 9, 2023

Source: Hindustan Times

Oppo unveiled its Reno 13 series smartphones, the Oppo Reno 13 5G and the Oppo Reno 13 Pro 5G, focusing on mid-range specifications suitable for upper mid-range consumers.

Key Points:

  • Oppo Reno 13 priced at ₹37,999 for the base model; ₹39,999 for 8GB + 256GB variant.
  • Oppo Reno 13 Pro priced at ₹49,999 for 12GB + 256GB variant; ₹54,999 for 12GB + 512GB model.
  • Discounts available: ₹5,499 off for Reno 13 Pro and up to ₹3,799 for Reno 13.
  • Reno 13 available in Luminous Blue and Ivory White; Reno 13 Pro in Mist Lavender and Graphite Grey.
  • Both models ship starting January 11, available via Oppo's website and Flipkart.
  • Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset, with up to 12GB RAM and UFS 3.1 storage.
  • Reno 13 Pro features a 6.83-inch AMOLED display; Reno 13 has a 6.59-inch display, both with a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Camera specifications include triple camera setups with 50MP sensors for both models.
  • Reno 13 Pro supports 80W fast charging and 50W wireless charging; Reno 13 supports 80W fast charging.
“The Oppo Reno 13 series aims to provide users with high-quality performance at mid-range prices.”

The launch of the Oppo Reno 13 series offers competitive features and pricing in the growing mid-range smartphone market, appealing to consumers looking for device sophistication without premium costs.

item.title: Top 5 high return stocks to watch out for in 2025 | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
Top 5 high return stocks to watch out for in 2025

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Live Mint

This article provides insights for first-time investors on how to analyze stocks. It emphasizes the importance of understanding business fundamentals, financial ratios, and market conditions before investing.

  • Stock analysis can be simplified with proper focus on key metrics.
  • Return ratios are critical indicators to assess a stock's potential.
  • Investors are encouraged to do thorough checks before making decisions.
"It's not as complicated as it seems."

The importance of investing knowledge cannot be understated, especially as new investors enter the market.

item.title: OnePlus 13 goes on sale in India today: First sale offers, price, specs and more | Mint - Mint
item.description:
OnePlus 13 goes on sale in India today: First sale offers, price, specs and more

Date: January 10, 2023

Source: Live Mint

The OnePlus 13 has officially launched in India, featuring several promotional offers including significant bank discounts and exchange bonuses.

Key Specifications:

  • 6.82-inch 120Hz ProXDR LPTO 4.1 AMOLED display with peak brightness of 4,500 nits.
  • Powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processor with up to 24GB of RAM and 1TB storage.
  • 6,000mAh battery supporting 100W wired and 50W wireless charging.
  • Triple 50MP camera setup with Hasselblad branding; 32MP front camera.
  • Runs on OxygenOS 15 based on Android 15 with long-term update promises.
  • Available in Midnight Ocean, Black Eclipse, and Arctic Dawn colors.
“OnePlus is offering ₹5,000 instant discount for ICICI Bank credit card users, making the effective price for the models ₹64,999, ₹71,999, and ₹84,999.”

The new flagship model starts at ₹69,999 for the 12GB RAM/256GB storage variant and will be available across various platforms including OnePlus's website and Amazon.

item.title: Xiaomi Pad 7 launched in India with anti-reflection display: Price, specs - Business Standard
item.description:
Xiaomi Pad 7 launched in India with anti-reflection display: Price, specs

Publication Date: January 10, 2025 | Source: Business Standard

Xiaomi has unveiled the Pad 7 tablet in India, featuring remarkable specifications and accessories aimed at enhancing productivity and user experience.

  • Powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Plus Gen 3 SoC.
  • Features a Nano Texture Display to reduce glare and reflection.
  • Runs on Android 15-based HyperOS 2 with AI productivity tools.
  • Prices start at Rs 27,999 for the base model, available January 13, 2025.
  • Accessories include the Xiaomi Pad 7 Cover, Focus Pen, and Focus Keyboard.
“The display provides a unique paper-like texture without compromising on vibrancy and brightness.”

The Xiaomi Pad 7 promises to offer a comfortable viewing experience and high-end features for productivity enthusiasts.

item.title: Best gaming phones under ₹20,000 in January 2025: Poco X7, iQOO Z9 and more | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Best Gaming Phones Under ₹20,000 in January 2025

Publication Date: January 2025 Source: Live Mint

As e-sports have grown in popularity, the demand for gaming phones in the country has increased, especially in the budget segment. To help you choose, we have compiled a list of the best phones in this price range.

  • Poco X7

    The Poco X7 5G features a 6.67-inch AMOLED curved display, MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Ultra processor, 50MP primary camera, and a 5500mAh battery with 45W TurboCharge.

  • CMF Phone 1

    Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 7300 chipset, this phone offers expandable storage and a unique design with Nothing OS 2.6.

  • Moto G85

    Utilizing Snapdragon 6s Gen 3, it includes a vibrant display, 50MP dual rear cameras, and a 5000mAh battery.

  • OnePlus Nord CE 4 Lite

    This model boasts a 6.67-inch AMOLED display and packs a Qualcomm Snapdragon 695 chipset with a dual rear camera setup.

  • iQOO Z9

    The iQOO Z9 comes with MediaTek Dimensity 7200, a 50MP camera, and supports dual 5G SIM cards.

item.title: ideaForge Technology allots 8,198 equity shares under ESOS - Business Standard
item.description:
ideaForge Technology Allocates 8,198 Equity Shares Under ESOS

Date: Jan 10 2025 | Source: Capital Market - Live News

ideaForge Technology has successfully allotted 8,198 equity shares under its Employee Stock Option Scheme (ESOS) on January 1, 2025, leading to an increase in the company's paid-up capital.

  • 8,198 equity shares were allotted under ESOS.
  • The paid-up capital increased from Rs. 43,03,70,200 to Rs. 43,04,52,180.
  • The total number of equity shares increased from 4,30,37,020 to 4,30,45,218.
“Powered by Capital Market - Live News”

This latest move reflects ideaForge's commitment to employee engagement and ownership, further enhancing its capital structure.

item.title: Free Fire Redeem Codes for January 10: Unlock diamonds, skins, and more for Free - India TV News
item.description:
Free Fire Redeem Codes for January 10: Unlock diamonds, skins, and more for Free

Date: January 10, 2025 Source: India TV News

Garena Free Fire, a popular mobile battle royale game, enables players to unlock exclusive items using redeem codes. These codes provide skins, diamonds, and other in-game rewards at no cost.

  • Free Fire Redeem Codes are alphanumeric and released daily by Garena.
  • Codes are time-sensitive and valid for only the first 500 users.
  • Steps to redeem codes include visiting the official site, logging in, entering the code, and claiming rewards.
  • January 10 codes include the Cobra Bundle and Pushpa Voice Pack among others.
“You must remember to redeem the codes faster as they are valid for a limited period.”

Players are encouraged to act quickly to secure their rewards before they expire.

item.title: POCO Launches Flagship X7 Series with Akshay Kumar, Redefining Premium Smartphones - India.com
item.description:
POCO Launches Flagship X7 Series with Akshay Kumar, Redefining Premium Smartphones

Jaipur – POCO India launched its highly anticipated flagship smartphones, the POCO X7 5G and POCO X7 Pro 5G, at a dynamic launch event in Jaipur. The series boasts cutting-edge technology, robust design, and a focus on performance, redefining the premium smartphone experience. Bollywood superstar Akshay Kumar was also introduced as the brand ambassador, aligning with POCO’s “Xceed Your Limits” philosophy.

Key Points:

  • POCO X7 5G: Features a 1.5K AMOLED display, powered by MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Ultra chipset, IP68 rating, and a 50MP primary camera.
  • POCO X7 Pro 5G: Boasts India's largest 6550mAh battery, MediaTek Dimensity 8400 Ultra processor, and 90W HyperCharge technology.
  • Software: Debuts Xiaomi HyperOS 2.0, based on Android 15, with innovative features like AI Subtitles.
  • Pricing: X7 Pro starts at Rs 24,999; X7 starts at Rs 19,999 with bank discounts and EMI options available.
  • Launch Date: X7 Pro goes on sale on 14th January; X7 on 17th January, exclusively on Flipkart.
“The X7 Series sets a new benchmark for innovation and value in the premium smartphone category.” - Himanshu Tandon, Country Head of POCO India

The launch of the POCO X7 Series represents a significant step for POCO in the premium smartphone market, combining top-notch features with competitive pricing and brand endorsement by a prominent celebrity.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim likely to join the Galaxy S25 lineup - India Today
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim likely to join the Galaxy S25 lineup

Publication Date: Not specified Source: India Today

The upcoming Samsung Galaxy S25 lineup is set to include a new model, the Galaxy S25 Slim. This addition is generating interest among tech enthusiasts and consumers alike.

  • The Galaxy S25 Slim is anticipated to feature cutting-edge technology.
  • It is expected to be a lighter and slimmer alternative to the existing Galaxy S25 models.
  • The release date and pricing details remain under wraps.
"The introduction of the Galaxy S25 Slim marks a significant step in Samsung's product diversity strategy."

Samsung continues to innovate, and the Galaxy S25 Slim is poised to contribute to its competitive edge in the smartphone market.

item.title: Musk’s xAI launches iOS app for its Grok chatbot in the U.S. - The Hindu
item.description:
Musk’s xAI launches iOS app for Grok chatbot in the U.S.

Date: January 10, 2025 Source: The Hindu

xAI has released a standalone iOS app for its Grok chatbot, enabling features similar to its web version, including rewriting, summarising, and generating images from text prompts. Users can access real-time data and news while the app is currently available only in the U.S. An Android version is yet to be announced. The Grok chatbot has transitioned to a free service after previously being exclusive to X Premium subscribers.

  • Grok performs tasks like rewriting, summarising, and generating images from text.
  • The app allows access to real-time data and news.
  • The launch follows previous beta testing in selected countries.
  • The Musk-owned AI firm has raised significant funding, with a reported $12 billion across two rounds.
“Grok was previously available only to X Premium subscribers but is now free for all.”

The launch of the Grok app is a significant move for xAI, further integrating its AI technology into daily user interactions on X.

item.title: Depreciation pressure on South Asian currencies expected to ease in near term - Business Standard
item.description:
Depreciation Pressure on South Asian Currencies Expected to Ease

Last Updated: Jan 10 2025 | Source: UN World Economic Situation and Prospects 2025 report

In 2024, most South Asian currencies including the Indian rupee and the Bangladesh taka faced depreciation against the United States dollar. This trend is expected to ease due to recent monetary changes in the U.S. economy.

  • South Asian currencies depreciated from January to November 2024.
  • The U.S. dollar was strong for most of 2024, with a brief period of weakness from late July to September.
  • The easing depreciation pressure is linked to increased attractiveness for investments in South Asian economies.
The United States dollar remained strong for most of 2024, except for a period of weakness from late July through September.

This anticipated easing provides a hopeful outlook for South Asian economies, potentially stabilizing their currencies in the near future.

item.title: iPhone 17 Air coming in September 2025 with A19 chipset and ultra thin design? Here is everything we know so far - India Today
item.description:
iPhone 17 Air coming in September 2025 with A19 chipset and ultra thin design?

Published On: Jan 10, 2025 | Published By: Divya Bhati

Apple is rumored to be launching the iPhone 17 Air in September 2025, featuring a sleek design and powerful A19 chipset. This model aims to replace the iPhone Plus variants and may introduce advanced technologies to the flagship lineup.

  • The iPhone 17 Air could become Apple’s thinnest device at just 6mm.
  • It will reportedly utilize a custom-designed 5G modem and might be powered by the A19 chipset.
  • Pricing is expected to start around USD 899, potentially surpassing the iPhone 16 Pro Max's price depending on features.
  • The device may feature a 48-megapixel main camera, with a simpler camera system overall.
  • Apple is focusing on advanced display technology to achieve the ultra-thin profile.
“Apple is planning to launch an iPhone 17 Air.” - Mark Gurman, Bloomberg

As the launch date approaches, more information is expected to surface, indicating whether the iPhone 17 Air will meet its ambitious design and performance goals.

item.title: Xiaomi Pad 7 launched in India with Snapdragon processor and 144 Hz display - The Hindu
item.description:
Xiaomi Pad 7 Launched in India Featuring Snapdragon Processor and 144 Hz Display

Published on: January 10, 2025 Source: The Hindu

Xiaomi has officially launched the Pad 7 in India, featuring a powerful Snapdragon processor and various accessories.

  • The Pad 7 includes a Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 processor with up to 12 GB RAM and 256 GB storage.
  • It features an 11.2-inch display with a 144 Hz refresh rate and peak brightness of 800 nits.
  • The tablet is powered by an 8,850 mAh battery with a 45 W fast charger included.
  • Camera specifications include a 13 MP rear camera and an 8 MP front camera.
  • Available colors are Graphite Grey, Sage Green, and Mirage Purple.
  • Pricing: Starts at ₹27,999 for the 8 GB/128 GB model, going up to ₹32,999 for the nano texture display edition.
“The Xiaomi Pad 7 brings next-gen AI features like writing, drawing, and summarizing.”

The new tablet will be available for purchase starting January 13, 2025.

item.title: Elon Musk’s X Is Now Bringing A Separate App For Grok AI Chatbot: What It Offers - News18
item.description:
Elon Musk’s X Launches Standalone App for Grok AI Chatbot

Date: January 10, 2025 Source: News18

Elon Musk’s X is introducing the Grok AI chatbot as a standalone app for iPhone users in select regions, aiming to compete with Google and OpenAI.

  • The Grok AI chatbot is now available for free to all users.
  • A separate app for Grok AI is currently in beta, aiming to enhance accessibility.
  • Previously, Grok AI was available mainly to users on the X Premium+ plan.
  • The AI can create images, answer queries, and summarize articles, competing with other major AI tools.
  • Future expansions may include a website for broader access and possibly an Android version.
“The free nature of Grok AI shows its true colors, as mentioned by the X users, who claim they can ask 10 questions to the Grok 2 AI model...”

This new development positions Grok AI as a notable player in the evolving AI landscape, with potential impacts on both technology and user engagement.

item.title: Poco X7 vs Poco X6: Specifications, features, price, and more compared - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Poco X7 vs Poco X6: Specifications, Features, Price, and More Compared

Date: Jan 10, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The article provides a detailed comparison between the newly launched Poco X7 and its predecessor, the Poco X6. It outlines the upgrades in features, performance, and pricing to help prospective buyers make an informed decision.

  • The Poco X7 is priced starting at Rs.19999 for 8GB + 128GB, while the Poco X6 launched at Rs.21999 for 8GB RAM and 256GB.
  • The design of the Poco X7 includes a new iPhone 16-like vertical camera module with an IP66/68/69 rating, compared to the Poco X6's IP54 rating.
  • For display, the Poco X7 features a 6.67-inch AMOLED 3D curved display, while the Poco X6 has a 6.67-inch 1.5K OLED display.
  • The performance specifications reveal the Poco X7 utilizes the MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Ultra processor, whereas the Poco X6 is powered by Snapdragon 7s Gen 2.
  • The camera setup in the Poco X7 includes a 50MP primary camera and 20MP selfie camera, while the Poco X6 features a 64MP main camera.
  • Battery capacity also varies, with the Poco X7 at 5500mAh and the Poco X6 at 5100mAh, though the latter supports faster 67W charging.
“Xiaomi sub-brand, Poco launched its new generation X series smartphones in the mid-range market.”

The comparison highlights the significant improvements in design and specifications of the Poco X7 over the Poco X6, making it a compelling option in the budget smartphone segment.
